verses.verse: I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, will I <S%H2167>sing<s%>.

I will behave myself <S%H7919>wisely<s%> in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>. O when will you <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H1980>me<s%>? I will walk <S%H7130>inside<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> with a <S%H8537>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

I will <S%H7896>set<s%> no <S%H1100>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> before my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: I <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6213>work<s%> of them that turn <S%H7750>aside<s%>; it shall not cleave to <S%H1692>me<s%>.
A <S%H6141>perverse<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H3045>me<s%>: I will not know a wicked <S%H7451>person<s%>.

Whoever <S%H5643>privately<s%> <S%H3960>slanders<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, him will I cut <S%H6789>off<s%>: him that has a <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H5869>look<s%> and a <S%H7342>proud<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> will not I <S%H3201>allow<s%>.

My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be upon the <S%H539>faithful<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, that they may <S%H3427>live<s%> with <S%H1980>me<s%>: he that walks in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, he shall serve <S%H8334>me<s%>.

He that <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H7423>deceit<s%> shall not <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H7130>inside<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>: he that <S%H1696>tells<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall not <S%H3559>stay<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

I will <S%H1242>early<s%> <S%H6789>destroy<s%> all the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; that I may cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H6466>doers<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
